full_summary:
====================================

### Tender Announcement
#### SSC-23-00022292

**Tender Information**
--------------------

* **Tender Title:** Ubuntu Pro or Equivalent for Shared Services Canada
* **Tender Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Publication Date:** March 13, 2023
* **Closing Date:** March 27, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM EST

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1P 0B6

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender applies to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Bid Instructions**
---------------------

To participate in the tender process, bidders must register in the Shared Services Canada P2P Portal. Registration provides access to:

* View and access solicitations from Shared Services Canada
* Submit a response to a solicitation
* Receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations
* Be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments
* Submit invoices and receive payment status updates

To register, visit [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).

**Amendment**
--------------

An amendment (001) has been issued to replace the OEM Certification form with the Software Publisher Authorization form.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information, please contact:

* Chantal Deland
* Email: [chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-551-7304
* Fax: 0
